text: Fábio Luís Santos de Almeida, known as Fábio Luís (born 22 August 1983) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Académica de Coimbra on 26 September 2011 in a game against Feirense. ==Honours== ;Académica de Coimbra *Taça de Portugal: 2011–12 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:Sportspeople from Porto Alegre Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Ipatinga Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Desportiva São Caetano players Category:Esporte Clube Santo André players Category:Avaí FC players Category:Paraná Clube players Category:Guaratinguetá Futebol players Category:Clube Atlético Bragantino players Category:Ulsan Hyundai FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in South Korea Category:Porto Alegre Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Académica de Coimbra – O.A.F. players Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Primeira Liga players Category:São Carlos Futebol Clube players Category:Treze Futebol Clube players Category:Association football forwards
title: Fábio Luís
